title: Is the world going to end tomorrow or in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s a Christian preacher says we’re living in the ‘era of the sixth seal’ and the seventh seal, ie the second coming of Jesus and the end of the world, will be this year. He doesn’t seem to have a date though. Jeane Dixon who allegedly predicted JFK’s death is also predicting the end of the world for this year. Also based on the imagery in Revelations. Again, no date. F Kenton Beshore, another preacher, says it will happen by 2021 so that puts this year as highly likely but again no date. Oddly enough those are the only ones I can find for this year, which makes 2020 a pretty positive year I’d say compared to the number of predictions we usually get and oddly they’re all Christian inspired Second Coming and Revelations inspired ones. No Nibaru, no aliens, no ancient predictions. I’m sure we’ll get more appearing and then passing as the year goes on, but I’m surprised there’s so few, especially with the year being a nice round number.

I am one of those who believe such prediction to be true. It may not be the end but there maybe be some big changes on our planet To what extent or the cause, we just don’t know.
